mapper.sql: stockID, wareID, oilID, stockNumber, stockProduceDate, stockDate, stockBarCode, stockReGruantee, stockState, stockNote
mapper.insert: insert into stock_table (stockID, wareID, oilID, stockNumber, stockProduceDate, stockDate, stockBarCode, stockReGruantee, stockState, stockNote) values (#{stockID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{wareID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{oilID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stockNumber,jdbcType=REAL}, #{stockProduceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{stockDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{stockBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockReGruantee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into stock_table
stockID,
wareID,
oilID,
stockNumber,
stockProduceDate,
stockDate,
stockBarCode,
stockReGruantee,
stockState,
stockNote,

mapper.update:
update stock_table
wareID = #{wareID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
oilID = #{oilID,jdbcType=BIGINT},
stockNumber = #{stockNumber,jdbcType=REAL},
stockProduceDate = #{stockProduceDate,jdbcType=DATE},
stockDate = #{stockDate,jdbcType=DATE},
stockBarCode = #{stockBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stockReGruantee = #{stockReGruantee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stockState = #{stockState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stockNote = #{stockNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where stockID = #{stockID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update stock_table set wareID = #{wareID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, oilID = #{oilID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stockNumber = #{stockNumber,jdbcType=REAL}, stockProduceDate = #{stockProduceDate,jdbcType=DATE}, stockDate = #{stockDate,jdbcType=DATE}, stockBarCode = #{stockBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stockReGruantee = #{stockReGruantee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stockState = #{stockState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stockNote = #{stockNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stockID = #{stockID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from stock_table left join oil_table on stock_table.oilID = oil_table.oilID left join oilType_table on oil_table.oilTypeID = oilType_table.oilTypeID where wareID = #{wareID}

select stock_table.oilID,stockNumber,oilName,oilCode,oil_table.oilTypeID,oilType_table.oilType from stock_table left join oil_table on stock_table.oilID = oil_table.oilID left join oilType_table on oil_table.oilTypeID = oilType_table.oilTypeID where wareID = #{wareID}
